item.title: Time Is Running Out for Lebanon to Disarm Hezbollah, U.S. Officials Warn
item.description: The United States, Israel and the Gulf Arab states are pressuring Lebanon’s government to act decisively against the group.

item.title: After Boat Strike, Rubio Says U.S. Will Help Other Nations ‘Blow Up’ Crime Groups
item.description: The Trump administration aims to carry out more violent strikes against drug cartels, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said as he met with Ecuador’s pre...

item.title: Appeals Court Says ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ Detention Center Can Stay Open
item.description: An appeals panel paused a federal judge’s ruling that no additional detainees could be sent to the center, and that much of it had to be dismantled wi...

item.title: Quakes on Mars Reveal New Features of the Planet’s Interior
item.description: Using data from NASA’s retired InSight lander, two separate teams of researchers found evidence of a sluggish Martian mantle and a solid inner core.

item.title: Trump Tests the Limits of His Power With a New Airstrike
